commits.content:
import { motion, AnimatePresence } from 'framer-motion'; // eslint-disable-next-line @typescript-eslint/no-unused-vars const ProductFormSidebar = ({ isOpen, onClose, formData, setFormData, handleSubmit, handleClear, handlePriceChange, renderCategories, categories, handleCategoryChange, brands, imagePreview, handleImageChange, handleRemoveImage, handleAdditionalInfoChange, editingProduct }) => { return ( {isOpen && (

{editingProduct ? "Cập nhật sản phẩm" : "Thêm sản phẩm mới"}

Chọn danh mục:

{renderCategories(categories, null, formData, (categoryId) => handleCategoryChange(categoryId, categories, formData, setFormData))}
